TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RSACng extends System.Security.Cryptography.RSA
Public NotInheritable Class RSACng Inherits RSA
public ref class RSACng sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::RSA

summary.span: 提供 RSA 算法的下一代加密技术(CNG)实现。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the RSA algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类。The class is derived from the class. 因此，它不是现有的使用的是直接替代。Therefore, it is not a drop-in replacement for existing uses of . 使用类似于的编程模型类而不是类。 uses a programming model that is similar to the class rather than the class. 例如:For example: - 使用的密钥由单独的管理对象。The key used by is managed by a separate object. 与此相反，有一个密钥，直接绑定到该类型本身的操作。In contrast, has a key that is directly tied to the operations of the type itself. - 执行签名和验证签名使用的属性等操作对象，就像使用它的对象属性来控制签名和验证操作。 performs such operations as signing and verifying signatures by using properties of the object, just as uses its object properties to control signing and verification operations. > [!NOTE] > 类是使用 Windows CNG 库的 RSA 算法的实现，在非 Windows 操作系统上不可用。The class is an implementation of the RSA algorithm using the Windows CNG libraries and isn't available on operating systems other than Windows. 对于不执行 Windows 互操作的应用程序，建议您使用而不是直接引用此类型。For applications which aren't doing Windows interop, you're encouraged to use instead of referencing this type directly.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 使用具有指定大小的随机生成密钥初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a randomly generated key of the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效密钥大小范围从 384 至 16,384 位，以 8 为增量。Valid key sizes range from 384 to 16,384 bits, in increments of 8. 我们建议的所有键使用的最小大小为 2048 位。We recommend that a minimum size of 2,048 bits be used for all keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的`key`必须是。The of `key` must be . 此构造函数创建密钥的副本。This constructor creates a copy of the key. 即使`key`是已释放，在 RSA 此密钥对象的副本保持活动状态。Even if `key` is disposed, the copy of this key object in RSA remains alive.

exception.span: 不是有效的 RSA 密钥。

span.span: is not a valid RSA key.

summary.span: 通过创建为参数结构创建新的 ，来替换当前实例使用的现有密钥。

span.span: Replaces the existing key that the current instance is working with by creating a new for the parameters structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parameters`仅 exponent 和 modulus，只包含一个公钥为导入。If `parameters` contains only an exponent and modulus, only a public key is imported. 如果`parameters`还包含对导入的完整密钥 P 和 Q 值。If `parameters` also contains P and Q values, a full key pair is imported.

exception.span: 既不包含指数，也不包含模数。

span.span: contains neither an exponent nor a modulus.

exception.span: 不是有效的 RSA 密钥。

span.span: is not a valid RSA key.

exception.span: 是一个完整的密钥对并使用默认的 KSP。

span.span: is a full key pair and the default KSP is used.

member this.Key : System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey

summary.span: 获取将由 对象用于它执行的任何加密操作的密钥。

span.span: Gets the key that will be used by the object for any cryptographic operation that it performs.
The key used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回密钥重置，例如通过更改的情况下，释放对象属性，通过使用若要创建新的密钥，或通过父处置对象。The returned object is disposed if the key is reset, for instance by changing the property, by using the to create a new key, or by disposing of the parent object. 因此，应确保，在这些情况下不再使用的键对象。Therefore, you should ensure that the key object is no longer used in these cases. 这对象不是与相同对象传递给构造函数中，如果使用该构造函数。This object is not the same as the object passed to the constructor, if that constructor was used. 但是，它将指向相同的 CNG 密钥。However, it will point to the same CNG key.

permission.span: 用于与非托管代码的操作。
